item.title: Tesla stock pops 7% after report Trump wants to relax U.S. self-driving rules
item.description: Elon Musk was a central figure in the business world pushing for Trump's return to the White House in the lead-up to this month's elections.

item.title: NBA, Warner Bros. Discovery agree to settle lawsuit over live game rights
item.description: The NBA and WBD have agreed to end all legal disputes, allowing the league to move forward with new media partners Comcast, Disney and Amazon.

item.title: Nasdaq rises to start the week, pops nearly 1% as Tesla shares rally: Live updates
item.description: The Nasdaq Composite rallied Monday as Tesla shares surged and Wall Street braced for major market-moving earnings reports.

item.title: European markets close slightly lower as investors await inflation data
item.description: European markets closed lower Monday as investors struggled to shake off last week's negative sentiment.

item.title: UK's Starmer calls for 'consistent, durable' ties with China in Xi meeting
item.description: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer called on Chinese President Xi Jinping on Monday to establish "consistent, durable" relations between their two na...
